title: IEUK 2025 Technology and Engineering Internship
description: Selected for the IEUK 2025 tech internship, gaining insights from firms like Google and GCHQ. Developed a startup roadmap, conducted market research, and proposed strategies to boost user retention.

title: 'Step Up' Experian Live Online Career Challenge (Python)
description: Sucessfully completed Experian Live Online Career Challenge, where I worked on a real-world data science problem focused on identifying mule accounts.

title: Portfolio Website
description: The updated site highlights my programming portfolio with a modernised design, and a more intuitive user experience. Built using React, it features smooth navigation and showcases my projects in a clean and professional layout.

title: KCS x NUCATS Hackathon 2024
description: Hackathon hosted by Kerridge Commercial Systems and Newcastle University's Computing and Technology Society.

title: NCL In Action
description: NCL in Action 24/25 is a year-long program at Newcastle University exploring AI's impact on industries, careers, and global challenges.
